short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides investigators and forensic examiners with links to investigative and forensic resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The SEARCH Investigative and Forensic Toolbar provides investigators and forensic examiners with access to investigative and forensic resources. Clicking on a link in the drop-down menu sends users to that webpage.
